meet_knights.title: The Knights of Hellstrom
meet_knights.text:
Three knights in silver armor ride up, their leader dismounting to approach. 
She has kind but stern eyes and an authoritative voice.

"Young one, we are Knights of Hellstrom, sworn to protect this realm. What 
brings a child to our shores?"

Her eyes fall on the blue stone and freeze in awe.

"That is the Traveler's Stone of legend! The prophecy is true. You are the 
Chosen One who will save our kingdom from the Shadow!"

The knights behind her kneel in reverence.

choices.text: Tell them your name is Rory

honest_introduction.title: Speaking Truth
honest_introduction.text:
"My name is Rory," you say with growing confidence. "I found this stone 
in a forest near my home. When I fell asleep holding it, I woke up here."

The knights exchange glances. Their leader nods slowly.

"Rory of the Stone," she says formally. "I am Knight Commander Kira of the 
Hellstrom Guard. The prophecies speak of one who would come bearing the 
Traveler's Stone in our darkest hour."

She gestures toward the distant castle.

"Our kingdom faces great peril. Will you come meet King Hellstrom? He has 
been expecting you."

show_stone.title: The Stone's Power Revealed
show_stone.text:
You hold the stone high and it blazes with brilliant light, making the 
air shimmer with magical energy. The knights' horses rear back in response.

The stone's power flows through you stronger than ever. You can feel its magic 
responding to your will, and sense the disturbance threatening this world.

"The stone has chosen you," Knight Commander Kira says with reverence. "Its 
power grows in your presence."

[MAGIC POWER INCREASED]

choices.text: Ask them to explain the prophecy

ask_stone_bearer.title: What Is a Stone-Bearer?
ask_stone_bearer.text:
"What exactly is a Stone-Bearer?" you ask.

Knight Commander Kira kneels to your eye level. "A Stone-Bearer is chosen by 
the Traveler's Stones themselves. Throughout history, only a few have been 
selected.

Stone-Bearers can channel incredible power - heal the wounded, purify corruption, 
and travel between realms. Most importantly, they can restore balance where 
darkness threatens light.

The fact that the stone chose you means you have great heroism within you."

prophecy_explanation.title: The Ancient Prophecy
prophecy_explanation.text:
Knight Commander Kira speaks reverently:

"Long ago, it was written: 'When darkness threatens to swallow the light, a 
child from beyond the veil shall come bearing the Traveler's Stone. With its 
power, they shall stand against the Shadow and restore balance.'"

She looks at you with hope and fear.

"The Shadow grows stronger each day, corrupting our lands and people. Our 
mages believe it originates from ancient ruins in the Darkwood.

But Rory, the prophecy warns the path ahead will test you unimaginably. Are 
you ready for such a burden?"

choices.text: I'm ready to face whatever comes
Can I think about it at the castle?

honest_fear.title: Courage in Fear
honest_fear.text:
"I'm scared," you admit. "I don't know about being a hero or fighting 
shadows. But these people need help, and if I'm the only one who can provide 
it... I guess I have to try."

Knight Commander Kira's expression softens with respect. "True courage isn't 
the absence of fear - it's acting in spite of it. You may be the bravest 
Stone-Bearer we've ever had."

The stone pulses warmly, responding to your honest words.

[WISDOM GAINED]

brave_acceptance.title: Embracing Destiny
brave_acceptance.text:
"I'm ready," you say with more confidence than you feel. "If this stone 
chose me and your kingdom needs help, I'll do whatever I can."

Knight Commander Kira beams with pride. "Spoken like a true hero! King 
Hellstrom will be overjoyed to meet you."

The other knights cheer, and the horses seem to prance with excitement. 
You've just accepted a destiny beyond imagination.

[COURAGE INCREASED]

accept_destiny.title: Accepting Your Role
accept_destiny.text:
"I understand," you say, feeling destiny's weight settle on your shoulders. 
"If this stone brought me here to help, I'll do what I can."

Knight Commander Kira smiles with relief and pride. "The realm is fortunate 
to have you, Rory. Come, let us take you to King Hellstrom. He has been 
waiting to meet the prophesied Stone-Bearer."

The stone pulses brighter, responding to your acceptance.

[DESTINY ACCEPTED]

choices.text: Go with them to the castle

hide_from_knights.title: Taking Cover
hide_from_knights.text:
You duck behind rocks near the water's edge. The stone's glow is muffled 
but still visible.

The knights scan the beach. You hear one speak: "The magical disturbance was 
definitely here. Someone with great power passed through."

Your heart pounds. Do you stay hidden or reveal yourself?

knights_depart.title: A Missed Opportunity
knights_depart.text:
You wait as the knights search, then they ride away. Now you're alone 
on an alien beach with no idea where to go.

As you start walking, you hear hoofbeats returning. The knights are back!

This time, you decide not to hide.

reveal_yourself.title: Coming Forward
reveal_yourself.text:
You step out from behind the rocks, the stone glowing brightly.

"I'm here," you call out.

The knights ride over. Their leader's eyes widen as she sees the stone.

"By the ancient laws," she breathes, "a Stone-Bearer has finally come!"

flee_to_forest.title: Into the Unknown
flee_to_forest.text:
You run toward the forest, but the knights follow on horseback. You can't 
outrun horses for long.

You stumble into a clearing, cornered. The knights emerge from the trees.

"Easy, child," the lead knight says calmly. "We're not your enemies."

ask_why_chase.title: Questions in the Forest
ask_why_chase.text:
"Why are you chasing me?" you demand, breathing hard.

Knight Commander Kira approaches slowly. "We sensed powerful magic on our 
shores. When we saw the light you carry, we knew what you must be.

You bear a Traveler's Stone. That makes you very important to our kingdom's 
survival. Please, will you come with us? Our king has been waiting."

choices.text: Ask what a Traveler's Stone is

hide_stone_meet.title: Concealing the Evidence
hide_stone_meet.text:
You slip the stone into your pocket, trying to hide its glow. The knights 
approach but seem less impressed.

"Greetings, young one. We are Knights of Hellstrom. You seem lost. What brings 
you to our shores?"

The stone pulses against your leg, urging you to reveal it.

claim_lost.title: A Lost Child
claim_lost.text:
"I'm lost," you say truthfully. "I don't know how I got here."

Knight Commander Kira's expression softens. "You're very far from any village, 
child. This beach is at our kingdom's edge.

There's something different about you. How did you come to be here alone?"

The stone grows warm, encouraging honesty.

ask_location.title: Where Am I?
ask_location.text:
"Where am I?" you ask, looking around at the strange landscape.

"You stand on the shores of Hellstrom Kingdom," Knight Commander Kira replies. 
"This is the Isle of Echoing Tides, our realm's easternmost point.

That is Castle Hellstrom in the distance. But tell me, child - how did you 
come to be here? Our shores are protected by ancient magic."

The stone pulses, as if responding to her words.

explain_arrival.title: The Truth of Your Journey
explain_arrival.text:
"I found this stone in a forest near my home," you begin, holding up 
the glowing orb. "When I fell asleep holding it, I woke up here."

The knights exchange significant glances. Knight Commander Kira steps closer.

"A Traveler's Stone," she whispers. "The prophecies spoke truly. You are the 
one we have been waiting for."

She bows formally. "We have long awaited the arrival of a Stone-Bearer from 
beyond our realm."
